faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Do I need a credit card to start?
faq.answer1: No. Our free tier requires no credit card. You can create your first proposal and capture leads without any payment information.
faq.answer2: Absolutely. There are no long-term contracts. Downgrade or cancel with one click from your dashboard.
faq.answer3: Full access to all Pro features: unlimited proposals, PDF export, analytics, CRM, and premium support.
faq.answer4: Every time someone views your proposal, you get a notification. See view counts, timestamps, and visitor details in your dashboard.
faq.answer5: Yes. All Pro and Business plans include one-click PDF export with your full branding.
faq.answer6: No setup fees, no hidden costs. Pay only the monthly or annual subscription.
faq.answer7: Yes. We use bank-level encryption (SSL/TLS), regular backups, and SOC 2 compliance. Your data is safe.
faq.question8: Can I use my own domain?
faq.answer8: Business plan includes custom domain support. Publish proposals at sponsors.yourbrand.com.
faq.answer9: Yes! Nonprofits get 20% off any paid plan. Contact us with your 501(c)(3) documentation.
faq.answer10: Free tier gets community support. Pro plans get 24-hour email support. Business plans get dedicated account managers.
